case.name: EMAS Offshore Pte Ltd v The Ship "APC Aussie 1" (No 2) [2009] FCA 1583 (23 December 2009)

whether the plaintiff can amend writ to add new claim for indemnity, in respect of liability arising in foreign proceedings, against demise charterer as relevant person after termination of charterparty admiralty
proceeding in rem commenced against demise charter
owner offering security for plaintiff's claim in writ naming demise charterer as relevant person
purpose of proceedings in admiralty not to put pressure on person not under a liability to the plaintiff practice and procedure

whether amendment to add claim to admiralty writ where relevant person is no longer demise charter would be appropriate in all the circumstances
